name: Pseudo C Dump v2
author: Matt Davis
description: Binary Ninja plugin to dump the Pseudo C generated by BN into a folder.
longdescription: This Python plugin for Binary Ninja will dump the Pseudo C generated by BN into a folder. It aims to be more complete and leverage the container structures you define within BN,.e.
